embed.title: I'm sorry, `{0.author.name}`. I'm afraid I can't do that
embed.description: The monkeys behind DJDiscord are scratching their head in confusion right now.

fields.name: **`But what happened exactly?`**
fields.value: While we can't tell you exactly what happened, we do have a long string to tell our developers (or just developer ;-;).

fields.name: **`Confused?`**
fields.value: If this is your first time using DJ Discord (or Discord bots in general) you can try **`!help`**

fields.name: **`Like the bot?`**
fields.value: Considering the bot is in beta, the best you can do is help contribute to the project, for more info, visit our website. **INSERT NON EXISTANT WEBSITE**
